top_categories.workout_context: Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest's South Carolina Sumter Forest, Forest gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 65 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before March.
69ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest. Train it until it feels boring.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
65 miles on South Carolina Sumter Forest gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
When someone attacks on South Carolina Sumter Forest gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Varied gradients on South Carolina Sumter Forest gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on South Carolina Sumter Forest gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Smooth pedaling at 65 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gravel Battle of Sumter Forest requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on south carolina sumter forest gravel to build confidence. Expect: south carolina sumter forest, forest gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 65 miles of south carolina sumter forest gravel in Whitmire, South Carolina.
